about.more03: This web application transforms cryptocurrency rate monitoring into an engaging experience. 📈 Using the CoinGecko API, it displays up-to-date cryptocurrency rates in USD, offering users flexibility and interactivity.
about.more04: 📊 Technologies and data come together, enabling you to easily track the world of cryptocurrencies. 🌟
